selected_skills.name: read_diagram_value
selected_skills.purpose: To interpret and extract values from the geometric diagram, confirming D as the midpoint of AC.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to analyze the diagram and confirm the spatial relationships, particularly the midpoint property of D on AC.

selected_skills.name: map_value_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the calculated length of AC to one of the multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to match the calculated length of AC with the provided multiple-choice options and return the corresponding label.

new_skill_specs.name: calculate_length_using_midpoint
new_skill_specs.purpose: Calculate the length of segment AC using the midpoint property of D.
edge_cases: If D is not the midpoint, the calculation will be incorrect.
